com.complexible.common.memory

Interface ObjectSerializer<T>

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    HashableObjectSerializer<T>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractObjectSerializer, HashableObjectSerializerImpl, PrimitiveSerializers.LongSerializer

    public interface ObjectSerializer<T>

    An serializer which can round-trip POJOs to bytes for storage off heap or on disk.

    Since:
    2.1
    Version:
    2.1
    Author:
    Michael Grove

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      T read(LongByteBuffer theBuf)
      Read an object from the provided buffer
      long size()
      Return the serialized size of objects, in bytes
      boolean supportsNull()
      Indicates whether or not this object can serialize/deserialize null values
      void write(T theObj, LongByteBuffer theBuf)
      Write the provided object to the buffer

    • Method Detail

      • supportsNull

        boolean supportsNull()
        Indicates whether or not this object can serialize/deserialize null values
        Returns:
        true if nulls can be serialized, false otherwise

      • size

        long size()
        Return the serialized size of objects, in bytes
        Returns:
        the size

      • read

        T read(LongByteBuffer theBuf)
        Read an object from the provided buffer
        Parameters:
        theBuf - the buffer
        Returns:
        the object

      • write

        void write(T theObj,
         LongByteBuffer theBuf)
        Write the provided object to the buffer
        Parameters:
        theObj - the object to write
        theBuf - the buffer to write to
